text: The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 79.10 feet on Tuesday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level of the dam was 41.65 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 178 cusecs. About 12,000 cusecs of water is discharged from the dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region. Another 400 cusecs is let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system in Salem, Namakkal and Erode districts, the PWD sources said.
title: Mettur Dam level
